{!Contact.FirstName},
By now you should be on the road to savings with your XPO fuel card. To increase the savings, be sure to check out the XPO Savings Locations in the link below:
https://www.google.com/url?hl=en&q=https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid%3D16RVAUoO7ZYWwgrFNsujHoXQleXg%26ll%3D35.0414511172241%252C-83.39113483818355%26z%3D7&source=gmail&ust=1526003561713000&usg=AFQjCNGwCcG6Ow3z27lTuCuQRTIwFAPuoQ

Brands include Michelin, Goodyear, Continental, Yokohama, Cooper, and Oliver. More information is attached.
We value your business. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to call us at 800-749-1724 for customer service.
Thank you, Marti Watson Relationship Manager, EFS Phone: 901-474-0825 | F: 801-624-3049 marti.watson@efsllc.com
